archimate:Constraint.name: NFR001: The solution need to be Compatible with DR architecture
archimate:Constraint.documentation: Solution need to be compatible with disk level geographic replica with 3 site. Specifically ALL the informations business relateed need to be persisted transactionaly on replicated DASD. In other word the state of the system (from a busines spoint of view) need to be persisted on replicated DASD.
